description:
Course Description

In this course, you will be presented with 10 easy to make Japanese dish recipes. It includes a combination of main dishes, side dishes and soups. These recipes are

  • Simple
  • Delicious
  • Healthy

These are recipes that your family and friends will love and that you'll want to continue to prepare for them over the coming months.

The lectures in this lecture are in English. Each lecture has three parts. The first part of the lecture presents the 7 steps in making the dish. The second part is the cooking video. The last part of the lecture are some useful notes and tips for cooking.

At the end of the course is the list of ingredients and recipes for the dishes discussed in the class.

What are the requirements?

  • Basic cooking utensils: pan, knife, chopping board

What am I getting from this course?

  • 10 recipes of simple Japanese dish made easy
  • Make amazing Japanese recipes including the main course, side dish and soup.
  • Make new recipes which you can continually serve at home for the following months.

Who are the target audience?

  • Anyone who wants to learn simple and easy to make Japanese dishes at their home.
title: Japanese Cooking Class: 10 Easy To Make Recipes from Japan
instructors: Haamalu Limited Liability Company, Pearl Ishizaki
